snippet: World Trade Center Properties, which owned the twin towers, sued American and United Airlines in 2008 alleging negligence in the 2001 terrorist attacks.
abstract: Federal Judge Alvin K Hellerstein rules that AMR Corporation's American Airlines and United Continental Holdings must face a federal trial over negligence claims tied to the hijacking of jetliners used in the Sept 11, 2001, terrorist attacks; World Trade Center Properties sued the airlines in 2008.
lead_paragraph: World Trade Center Properties, which owned the twin towers, sued American and United Airlines in 2008 alleging negligence in the 2001 terrorist attacks.

headline.seo: American and United Airlines Must Face Trial Over Sept. 11 Attacks
